ygData.subject: RE: Bards in Mistmoore
ygData.msgSnippet: A shadowy black helicopter maintenance technician begins to cast a spell.... Sylly. ... From:	John Kim [mailto:kim@stormhaven.org] Sent:	Thursday, August 12,
ygData.messageBody:
A shadowy black helicopter maintenance technician begins to cast a spell....

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 12, 1999 2:54 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bards in Mistmoore

From: John Kim <kim@...>

On Wed, 11 Aug 1999, Jesse wrote:
>
> > Heck, I've even had something cast at me through the
walls
> > while I was in Lesser Faydark standing right next to the
> > Mistmoore zone. I know this is supposed to be
impossible, and

> Eh, I find this really really hard to believe, seeing as
the mobs simply
> don't exist in that zone. If you could go past the zone
border, you'd find

It was not a fae drake. Like I said, it was a Mistmoore-ish
name, fit in with the general theme of custodians, ushers,
shadowy scribes, etc. I still don't understand what
happened.
I don't really expect anyone to believe me - I have a hard
time believing it myself.
